QualityQuest: The Quality Challenge

Identify the 8 quality attributes from ISO/IEC 25010 in software scenarios

ISO/IEC 25010 Software Quality Beginner

Welcome to QualityQuest!

Identify quality attributes in real-world software scenarios

In this game, you'll analyze different software development scenarios and identify which of the 8 quality attributes from ISO/IEC 25010 is most relevant in each case.

ISO/IEC 25010 Quality Attributes

1. Functional Suitability

How well the software meets stated and implied needs

2. Performance Efficiency

Performance relative to resources used

3. Compatibility

How well software exchanges information with other systems

4. Usability

How effectively users can use the software

5. Reliability

How well software performs specific functions under specific conditions

6. Security

How well software protects information and data

7. Maintainability

How effectively software can be modified

8. Portability

How effectively software can be transferred to different environments

How to Play

1

Read each scenario carefully

2

Choose the quality attribute that is most relevant to the scenario

3

Submit your answer to see if you're correct

4

Learn from the explanation provided

5

Earn points for correct answers and complete all scenarios to win!
